item.description:
Tickets are $20 for general admission + at the door, $15 for early purchases, and $5 for MIT affiliates.

Featuring:
- MIT Asian Dance Team
- American Chinese Art Society
- Angel Performance Art
- Boston Chinese Dance
- Bright Pearl Chinese Dance
- Cambridge Center for Chinese Culture
- Cambridge Chinese Choral Society
- Chu Ling Dance Academy
- Dance Revelasian
- Dong Fang Dance Troupe
- GBCCA Choral Society
- Harvard Asian-American Dance Troupe
- Jia-Yun Dance Troupe
- MIT Bhangra
- MIT Chinese Yo-Yo Club
- MIT Ohms
- MIT Oori
- Silk Bamboo Youth Ensemble
- Sunshine Dance Troupe
- Syncopasian
- YMCA Chinese Dance Program
item.why:
MIT Asian Dance Team presents INSPIRASIAN, the first annual Boston Asian Performing Arts Festival & finest display of Asian performing talent in the Boston area!
Buy tickets here: http://mit.universitytickets.com/user_pages/event.asp?id=171&cid=27

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Inspirasian: Boston Asian Performing Arts Festival
